line.text: O lest the world should task you to recite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: What merit lived in me that you should love
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: After my death (dear love) forget me quite
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For you in me can nothing worthy prove
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Unless you would devise some virtuous lie
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To do more for me than mine own desert
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And hang more praise upon deceased I
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than niggard truth would willingly impart
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: O lest your true love may seem false in this
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That you for love speak well of me untrue
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: My name be buried where my body is
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And live no more to shame nor me nor you
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For I am shamed by that which I bring forth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And so should you to love things nothing worth
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
